Package org.logevents.formatting

Class ConsoleFormatting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logevents.formatting.ConsoleFormatting
  • public class ConsoleFormatting
extends Object
    Returns ANSI colored strings unless unsupported. This class will check if the JANSI project is loaded and if so, use ANSI colors also on Windows. If loaded on Windows without JANSI, the ANSI escape codes will be omitted.
    Author:
    Johannes Brodwall
